timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text:
"Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, my fellow Americans."

Watch President Obama's final #SOTU → https://t.co/7ZgBUWI9cz

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: "Tonight marks the eighth year I’ve come here to report on the State of the Union." —@POTUS #SOTU https://t.co/ewrcxEsQvA

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: "I hope we can work together this year on bipartisan priorities like criminal justice reform." —@POTUS to @SpeakerRyan #SOTU

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: "Tonight, I want to go easy on the traditional list of proposals for the year ahead." —@POTUS: https://t.co/7ZgBUWI9cz #SOTU

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text:
"Protecting our kids from gun violence.
Equal pay for equal work.
Paid leave.
Raising the minimum wage." —@POTUS on what he's fighting for

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: "They are still the right thing to do, and I will not let up until they get done." —@POTUS #SOTU https://t.co/CA3ziMtwjv

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: “I don’t want to talk just about the next year. I want to focus on the next 5 years, 10 years, and beyond.” —@POTUS #SOTU

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: “I want to focus on our future." —@POTUS: https://t.co/7ZgBUWI9cz #SOTU https://t.co/KtqpN6KlOU

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: "We did not, in the words of Lincoln, adhere to the 'dogmas of the quiet past.' Instead we thought anew, and acted anew" —@POTUS #SOTU

timeline.title: WhiteHouse
timeline.text: “It’s in that spirit that we have made the progress of these past 7 years.” —@POTUS on the American spirit #SOTU https://t.co/tx4HquIsI4
